content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.

content: A short piece written for recorder quintet, imitating the lively atmosphere of Chinese New Year. Blending fantasy and folk-ish styles, it features strong rhythmic patterns and non-functional harmonies to evoke a sense of Eastern mystery and celebration.
